column2: Why hello there! My name is Isabel, it is a pleasure to meet you. I live at the north farm with my husband and kids.
I'm going to sya this as kindly as I can. I Hate this.
Oh dear.. please don't give me these.
Ah, a gift? Bless your heart.
This is quite nice, thank you kindly.
Oh dear this is wonderful, thank you so much.
